MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH48 and EH52 postcode areas of Bathgate and Broxburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:40pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:37pm on 17th October 2020.
